Functions
```{r}
# Get data into appropriate format
clean_catch <- function(data_list, i){
  data_frame <- as.data.frame(data_list[[i]])
  names(data_frame) <- tolower(names(data_frame))
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'latdd'] <- 'lat'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'londd'] <- 'lon'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'total_no'] <- 'catch'
  data_frame <- filter(data_frame, 
                       active == 'Y')
  return(data_frame)
}

clean_sp <- function(data_list, i){
  data_frame <- as.data.frame(data_list[[i]])
  names(data_frame) <- tolower(names(data_frame))
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'latdd'] <- 'lat'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'londd'] <- 'lon'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'total_no'] <- 'catch'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'nmeas'] <- 'num_measured'
  names(data_frame)[names(data_frame) == 'exp'] <- 'haul_exp'
  data_frame <- filter(data_frame, 
                       active == 'Y')
  return(data_frame)
}

# Match the climate data to the catch (haul level) data
climate_match <- function(data){
  data <- merge(data, npgo_index,
                by.x = c("year", "month"),
                by.y = c("YEAR", "MONTH"),
                all.x = T, all.y = F)
  data <- merge(data, pdo_index,
                by.x = c("year", "month"),
                by.y = c("year", "month"),
                all.x = T, all.y = F)
  data <- subset(data, select = -c(Date))
  data <- merge(data, oni_matrix,
                by.x = c("year", "month"),
                by.y = c("year", "month"),
                all.x = T, all.y = F)
  match_npgo <- match(data$year, npgo_means$YEAR)
  data$NPGO_mean <- npgo_means$NPGO_mean[match_npgo]
  match_pdo <- match(data$year, pdo_means$year)
  data$PDO_mean <- pdo_means$PDO_mean[match_pdo]
  match_oni <- match(data$year, oni_means$year)
  data$ONI_mean <- oni_means$ONI_mean[match_oni]
  data$NPGO_pos <- data$NPGO_mean + abs(min(data$NPGO_mean))
  data$PDO_pos <- data$PDO_mean + abs(min(data$PDO_mean))
  data$ONI_pos <- data$ONI_mean + abs(min(data$ONI_mean))
  return(data)
}

# Combine the grouped length data with the catch data
merge_lengths <- function(catch, hauls, subset, ctd_means){
  data <- merge(catch,
                subset[, c("haul_no", "cruise", "small", "large")],
                by = c("haul_no", "cruise"))
  data_id <- merge(data,
                   hauls[, c("haul_no", "cruise", "ctd_index")],
                   by = c("haul_no", "cruise"))
  data_ctd <- merge(data_id,
                    ctd_means,
                    by = c('cruise',
                           'ctd_index',
                           'year'),
                    all.x = T)
  return(data_ctd)
}

# Group into two size classes
size_calc <- function(sp, size){
  sizes <- mutate(sp, size_class = case_when(std_length <= size ~ "small",
                                             std_length > size ~ "large")) 
  subset <- sizes %>% 
    group_by(haul_no, cruise, haul_exp, size_class) %>%
    mutate(size_class = factor(size_class, levels = c("small", "large"))) %>%
    summarise(size_count = length(size_class)) %>%
    mutate(size_subset = size_count * haul_exp) %>%
    tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = size_class,
                       values_from = size_subset)
  return(subset)
}

# Plot relevant variables
plot_variables <- function(data){
  plot(table(data$year[data$catch > 0]),
       ylab = 'Frequency',
       xlab = 'Year',
       main = '')
  plot(table(data$jday[data$catch > 0]),
       ylab = 'Frequency',
       xlab = 'Day of Year',
       main = '')
  plot(table(data$lat[data$catch > 0]),
       ylab = 'Frequency',
       xlab = 'Latitude',
       main = '')
  plot(table(data$lon[data$catch > 0]),
       ylab = 'Frequency',
       xlab = 'Longitude',
       main = '')
  plot(table(data$strata[data$catch > 0]),
       ylab = 'Frequency',
       xlab = 'Strata',
       main = '')
  hist(data$catch, 
       breaks = 100,
       main = '',
       xlab = 'Catch') 
}

# Filter out needed pre-recruit species
species_filter <- function(data, species){
  data %>%
    select(c('cruise', 'date', 'year', 'month',
             'day', 'tow_depth', 'latitude', 
             'longitude', 'surface_temp', 
             species)) %>%
    rename(larval_count = species) %>%
    mutate(larval_count = ifelse(is.na(larval_count), 0, larval_count)) %>%
    mutate(larval_count = as.numeric(as.character(larval_count)))
  }
```

Data from emails
```{r}
# Load data
anch_exl_data <- here('data', 'anch_yoy.xlsx')
excel_sheets(path = anch_exl_data) # view the worksheets
anch_tab_names <- excel_sheets(path = anch_exl_data)

anch_data_list <- lapply(anch_tab_names, function(x) read_excel(path = anch_exl_data, sheet = x))

anch_catch <- clean_catch(anch_data_list, 1)
anch_sp <- clean_sp(anch_data_list, 2)

other_exl_data <- here('data', 'rockfish_dab_hake.xlsx')
excel_sheets(path = other_exl_data) # view the worksheets
other_tab_names <- excel_sheets(path = other_exl_data)

other_data_list <- lapply(other_tab_names, 
                          function(x) read_excel(path = other_exl_data, 
                                                 sheet = x, 
                                                 col_types = 'text'))

other_catch <- clean_catch(other_data_list, 1)
other_sp <- clean_sp(other_data_list, 2)

col_names_catch <- c('haul_no', 'year', 'month', 'jday', 'station', 
                     'net_in_latdd', 'net_in_londd', 'lat', 'lon', 
                     'bottom_depth', 'station_bottom_depth', 'shortbelly',
                     'widow', 'hake', 'dab')

col_names_sp <- c('haul_no', 'year', 'month', 'jday', 'station', 
                     'net_in_latdd', 'net_in_londd', 'lat', 'lon', 
                     'bottom_depth', 'station_bottom_depth', 'species',
                  'catch', 'num_measured', 'haul_exp', 'sp_no', 'std_length')

other_catch[col_names_catch] <- sapply(other_catch[col_names_catch], as.numeric)
other_sp[col_names_sp] <- sapply(other_sp[col_names_sp], as.numeric)

widow_catch <- other_catch %>% 
  select(-c('shortbelly', 'hake', 'dab')) %>%
  rename(catch = widow)
sbly_catch <- other_catch %>% 
  select(-c('widow', 'hake', 'dab')) %>%
  rename(catch = shortbelly)
dab_catch <- other_catch %>% 
  select(-c('shortbelly', 'hake', 'widow')) %>%
  rename(catch = dab)
hake_catch <- other_catch %>% 
  select(-c('shortbelly', 'widow', 'dab')) %>%
  rename(catch = hake)

widow_sp <- filter(other_sp, species == 597)
sbly_sp <- filter(other_sp, species == 604)
dab_sp <- filter(other_sp, species == 147)
hake_sp <- filter(other_sp, species == 382)

rm(list = c('anch_data_list', 'other_catch', 
            'other_data_list', 'other_sp',
            'anch_exl_data', 'anch_tab_names',
            'col_names_catch', 'col_names_sp',
            'other_exl_data', 'other_tab_names'))
```


Add climate indices
```{r}
# NPGO
npgo_index <- read.table("../data/npgo_data.txt",
                         header = T)

# PDO
pdo_index <- read.csv("../data/pdo_timeseries_ersstv5.csv")
pdo_index$Date <- as.Date(pdo_index$Date, "%Y-%m-%d")
pdo_index <- mutate(pdo_index,
                    year = lubridate::year(Date),
                    month = lubridate::month(Date))

# ONI
oni_index <- read.table("../data/oni_data.txt",
                        row.names = 1)
colnames(oni_index) <- c("01", "02", "03", "04",
                         "05", "06", "07", "08",
                         "09", "10", "11", "12")
oni_matrix <- melt(as.matrix(oni_index))
colnames(oni_matrix) <- c("year", "month", "ONI")

# Means
npgo_means <- npgo_index %>%
  filter(MONTH >= 1 & MONTH <= 3) %>%
  group_by(YEAR) %>%
  summarise(NPGO_mean = mean(NPGO))
pdo_means <- pdo_index %>%
  filter(month >= 1 & month <= 3) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(PDO_mean = mean(PDO))
oni_means <- oni_matrix %>%
  filter(month >= 1 & month <= 3) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(ONI_mean = mean(ONI))

# Match to dataframes
anch_catch <- climate_match(anch_catch)
widow_catch <- climate_match(widow_catch)
sbly_catch <- climate_match(sbly_catch)
dab_catch <- climate_match(dab_catch)
hake_catch <- climate_match(hake_catch)

rm(list = c('oni_index', 'oni_matrix', 'oni_means',
            'npgo_index', 'npgo_means', 'pdo_index',
            'pdo_means'))
```

```{r}
# Consolidate lengths

widow_subset <- size_calc(widow_sp, 55)
sbly_subset <- size_calc(sbly_sp, 30)
dab_subset <- size_calc(dab_sp, 39)
hake_subset <- size_calc(hake_sp, 35)

anch_subset[is.na(anch_subset)] <- 0
widow_subset[is.na(widow_subset)] <- 0
```

```{r}
# Extract CTD data
# RREAS
RREAS_CTD_info <- info('FED_Rockfish_CTD')

RREAS_ctds <- tabledap(RREAS_CTD_info,
                       fields = c('cruise', 'ctd_index',
                                  'temperature', 'salinity', 
                                  'oxygen', 'station',
                                  'ctd_depth', 'time'),
                       'ctd_depth<=10')

RREAS_cols <- c('temperature', 'salinity', 'oxygen')
RREAS_ctds[RREAS_cols] <- sapply(RREAS_ctds[RREAS_cols], as.numeric)

RREAS_ctd_means <- RREAS_ctds %>%
  mutate(date = format(as.POSIXct(time, tz = "UTC", format = "%Y-%m-%d")),
         year = lubridate::year(date)) %>%
  group_by(cruise, ctd_index, year) %>%
  summarise_at(vars('temperature', 'salinity', 'oxygen'), mean) %>%
  mutate_all(~ifelse(is.nan(.), NA, .)) 

# Pre-recruit
PRS_ctds <- read.csv(here::here('data', 'Prerecruit_env.csv'))[, -1]

PRS_avg_ctds <- PRS_ctds %>%
  filter(depth_m <= 10) %>%
  group_by(date, swfcs.station) %>%
  summarise_at(vars('temperature_c', 'salinity_psu', 'dissolved_oxygen'), mean) %>%
  mutate_all(~ifelse(is.nan(.), NA, .))
```

```{r, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 5, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
# polish boxplot for depth/length
anch_sp %>%
  mutate(depth_cut = cut(bottom_depth, breaks = seq(0, 3750, by = 250))) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_boxplot(aes(depth_cut, std_length),
               fill = "darkseagreen3", 
               outlier.alpha = 0.2) +  
  labs(y = "Length (mm)",
       x = "Depth (m)",
       title = "Size of YOY Anchovy by Depth") +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("0-250", "250-500", "500-750", "750-1000",
                              "1000-1250", "1250-1500", "1500-1750",
                              "1750-2000", "2000-2250", "2250-2500",
                              "2500-2750", "2750-3000", "3000-3250",
                              "3250-3500", "3500-3750")) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray91", colour = "gray91"),
        axis.line = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 22, family = "serif", face = "bold"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "serif", size = 14),
        axis.title = element_text(family = "serif", size = 18),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.7))
```

```{r, warning = FALSE}
grid.newpage()
# Create layout: nrow = 2, ncol = 2
pushViewport(viewport(layout = grid.layout(2, 2)))
# A helper function to define a region on the layout
define_region <- function(row, col){
  viewport(layout.pos.row = row, layout.pos.col = col)
} 
# Arrange the plots
print(yoy_anchplot3, vp = define_region(2, 1:2))
print(yoy_anchplot1, vp = define_region(1, 1))
print(yoy_anchplot2, vp = define_region(1, 2))

pushViewport(viewport(layout = grid.layout(2, 2)))
```
